attributes.action: A Discount in high street stores for unemployed people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As students get a discount,its only fair the unemployed get the same right as we are also out of work & need clothes for inteviews etc, as a suit & shoes can be quite expensive, the jobseekers allowence is only every two weeks. We can only afford food & to pay bills it would help if we could get some money off clothes aswell.

rejection.details: Discounts are a decision for individual companies to make.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
